name: Elvira II: The Jaws of Cerberus
content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the file Setup.exe
game:
  game_id: elvira2
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      src_path=$(echo "$1" | sed -r "s/(.+)\/.+/\1/")

      find "$src_path" -type f \( -iname "*.MUS" -o -iname "*.SND" -o -iname "*.VGA"
      -o -iname "GAMEPC" -o -iname "ICON.DAT" -o -iname "MENUS.DAT" -o -iname "MUSIC.DRV"
      -o -iname "MYLIB.FXB" -o -iname "START" -o -iname "STRIPPED.TXT" -o -iname "TABLES*"
      -o -iname "TBLLIST" -o -iname "TEXT*" \) -exec cp {} "$dst" \;'
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: $game $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
